actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to revise retirement benefits for certain employees of the Bureau of Indian Affairs and the Indian Health Service not entitled to Indian preference, provide greater opportunity for advancement and employment of Indians.

summary.text: Entitles to a civil service annuity those employees of the Bureau of Indian Affairs or of the Indian Health Service who complete 20 years of service before December 31, 1955, who were employed continuously from June 17, 1974, to the date of separation, and who are not otherwise entitled to full retirement benefits or to an Indian preference. Sets forth the method of computation of such annuity.

titles.title: A bill to revise retirement benefits for certain employees of the Bureau of Indian Affairs and the Indian Health Service not entitled to Indian preference, provide greater opportunity for advancement and employment of Indians.
